text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali to chair a ceremony in Carthage Palace to honour brilliant students.
- Health Minister Hedi Mhenni met his Qatari counterpart Abdulrahmen Salem al-Kawari on opportunities offered to the two countries to boost partnership in health sector.
- About 723 million dinars is to be devoted to modernize and irrigate farming areas under the 9th developpemnet plan 1997-2001.
- Tourist hotel nights in the eastern resort of Sousse rose by 16.7 percent during June to 631,285 compared with the same period of last year.
